_sText: I made this slot machine to a map, but I'm not going to use it. It works, and if you win it will spawn a weapon (which one depends on what symbols you win with). It's random, but unfortunately it's not harder to get 7-7-7 than to get the other ones. Everything is editable :) Textures is in the .rar :) - 7-7-7 = AWP BAR-BAR-BAR = Para ORANGE-ORANGE-ORANGE = Ak47 GRAPE-GRAPE-GRAPE = M4a1 BELL-BELL-BELL = P90 CHERRY-CHERRY-CHERRY = Deagle Every win will also give you 9 HP, just press the green button on the right hand side. I've put some decals in the texture-folder to explain the buttons and so on. Any bugs/questions/cons can be posted here, sent on a PM or sent(mail/MSN) to anders@evjen.tk - evjand
